org.ctoolkit.restapi.client

Interface RetrievalRequest<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the list item resource type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Request<List<T>>

    public interface RetrievalRequest<T>
extends Request<List<T>>
    The extended Request to provide retrieval specific API to work with list of resources.
    Author:
    Aurel Medvegy

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<T> execute()
      Execute a remote call to find the list of resource instance of given type.
      List<T> execute(int start, int length)
      Execute a remote call to find filtered list of resource instance.
      List<T> execute(Map<String,Object> criteria)
      Execute a remote call to find the list of resource instance of given type and additional filtering criteria.
      List<T> execute(Map<String,Object> criteria, Locale locale)
      Execute a remote call to find the list of resource instance of given type and additional filtering criteria.
      void setFirstResult(int start)
      Set the position of the first result to retrieve.
      void setMaxResults(int length)
      Set the maximum number of results to retrieve.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.ctoolkit.restapi.client.Request

        execute, query

    • Method Detail

      • execute

        List<T> execute()
        Execute a remote call to find the list of resource instance of given type.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface Request<List<T>>
        Returns:
        the list of resource instance

      • execute

        List<T> execute(int start,
              int length)
        Execute a remote call to find filtered list of resource instance.
        Parameters:
        start - the position of the first result, numbered from 0
        length - the maximum number of results to retrieve
        Returns:
        the list of filtered resource instance, if none returns empty list
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown for any negative numbers

      • execute

        List<T> execute(Map<String,Object> criteria)
        Execute a remote call to find the list of resource instance of given type and additional filtering criteria.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface Request<List<T>>
        Parameters:
        criteria - the optional filtering criteria map
        Returns:
        the list of resource instance matching filtering criteria, otherwise returns empty list

      • execute

        List<T> execute(Map<String,Object> criteria,
              Locale locale)
        Execute a remote call to find the list of resource instance of given type and additional filtering criteria.
        Specified by:
        execute in interface Request<List<T>>
        Parameters:
        criteria - the optional filtering criteria map
        locale - the language the client has configured to prefer in results if applicable
        Returns:
        the list of resource instance matching filtering criteria, otherwise returns empty list

      • setFirstResult

        void setFirstResult(int start)
        Set the position of the first result to retrieve.
        Parameters:
        start - the position of the first result, numbered from 0
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown for any negative numbers

      • setMaxResults

        void setMaxResults(int length)
        Set the maximum number of results to retrieve.
        Parameters:
        length - the maximum number of results to retrieve
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - thrown for any negative numbers
